tool_description: The Pakistan Gold Price API Collection offers real-time and historical gold price data for Pakistan. Users can access current prices, historical trends, and more. This API caters to investors, businesses, and developers, providing valuable insights into the Pakistani gold market. It's a reliable resource for making informed decisions related to gold trading and investment.
name: Gold Prices Pakistan
title: Gold Prices Pakistan

api_list.name: History
api_list.description: The /history endpoint offers a concise summary of the past 35 days of historical data specifically for 24-carat gold prices.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-prices-pakistan.p.rapidapi.com/history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-prices-pakistan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live
api_list.description: The /live endpoint provides real-time gold prices for Pakistan.
